LanguageData.RK_ApronSkirt.label: Ratkin apron skirt
LanguageData.RK_ApronSkirt.description: A simple dress with an apron.
LanguageData.RK_SummerDress.label: Ratkin summer dress
LanguageData.RK_SummerDress.description: A white summer dress, well-ventilated to keep the body cool in hot weather.
LanguageData.RK_StrawHat.label: Ratkin straw hat
LanguageData.RK_StrawHat.description: A straw hat made out of hay, which offers protection from sunlight.
LanguageData.RK_Muffler.label: Ratkin muffler
LanguageData.RK_Muffler.description: A thick neck scarf that mitigates the loss of body through the neck. Useful when crossing harsh deserts.
LanguageData.RK_Cardigan.label: Ratkin cardigan
LanguageData.RK_Cardigan.description: A cardiagan that can be worn as an additional layer over existing clothes, to protect the wearer from the cold.
LanguageData.RK_WoolenHat.label: Ratkin woolen hat
LanguageData.RK_WoolenHat.description: A knitted woolen hat for keeping the head warm in cold weather.
LanguageData.RK_CrossBack.label: Ratkin cross back
LanguageData.RK_CrossBack.description: A simple bag made by rolling up a large sheet of cloth and tying it diagonally across one's back, allowing the wearer to carry a little more luggage.
LanguageData.RK_Backpack.label: Ratkin backpack
LanguageData.RK_Backpack.description: A bag with a pair of shoulder straps that hangs from the wearer's back, allowing them to carry additional luggage.
LanguageData.RK_WorkerWear.label: Ratkin worker's outfit
LanguageData.RK_WorkerWear.description: A dress with a large apron, practical to wear for day-to-day work.
LanguageData.RK_Coif.label: Ratkin coif
LanguageData.RK_Coif.description: A close fitting cap worn while working. Keeps hair from falling over one's face.
LanguageData.RK_ResearchGown.label: Ratkin research gown
LanguageData.RK_ResearchGown.description: A gown worn for research work in the laboratory. It does not attract dust, and makes the wearer look intelligent.
LanguageData.RK_ResearchGlasses.label: Ratkin glasses
LanguageData.RK_ResearchGlasses.description: A pair of prescription glasses required for conducting higher-level Ratkin research projects. It helps correct the inherently-poor vision of Ratkins - as well as making them look a bit more intelligent.
LanguageData.RK_ExplorerWear.label: Ratkin explorer outfit
LanguageData.RK_ExplorerWear.description: A hard-wearing and comfortable set of clothes worn while exploring remote areas, allowing the wear to move more easily and quietly.
LanguageData.RK_ExplorerHat.label: Ratkin explorer hat
LanguageData.RK_ExplorerHat.description: A lightweight cloth-covered helmet patterned after human pith helmets, which offers protection from sunlight.
LanguageData.RK_ChefSuit.label: Ratkin chef suit
LanguageData.RK_ChefSuit.description: A set of white double-breasted jacket, trousers and apron, which protects the wearer from the splattering of boiling liquids in the kitchen. Increases the wearer's cooking speed.
LanguageData.RK_ChefHat.label: Ratkin chef hat
LanguageData.RK_ChefHat.description: A tall, round, pleated and starched white hat worn by chefs, which prevents hair from falling into food being cooked.
LanguageData.RK_GaurdenUniform.label: Ratkin Guardener uniform
LanguageData.RK_GaurdenUniform.description: The standard-issue uniform of Guardeners, an elite order of Ratkins devoted to tending the Ratkin Kingdom's gardens and defending them from enemies. Only the best of Ratkins can shoulder this great responsibility, and therefore have the privilege of wearing this outfit.
LanguageData.RK_WinterRobe.label: Ratkin winter robe
LanguageData.RK_WinterRobe.description: A thick fur-lined robe, ideal for Ratkins working outdoors in the tundra and polar regions.
LanguageData.RK_OutdoorBackpack.label: Ratkin outdoor backpack
LanguageData.RK_OutdoorBackpack.description: A rugged bag with a pair of shoulder straps that hangs from the wearer's back, allowing them to carry more luggage for long expeditions.
LanguageData.RK_OrderUniform.label: Ratkin order uniform
LanguageData.RK_OrderUniform.description: A rugged and reinforced combat uniform worn by Ratkin infantry. Makes the wearer look more imposing, boosts morale and improves pain resistance.
LanguageData.RK_OrderUniformB.label: Ratkin order uniform
LanguageData.RK_OrderUniformB.description: A rugged and reinforced combat uniform worn by Ratkin infantry. Makes the wearer look more imposing, boosts morale and improves pain resistance.
LanguageData.RK_BulletProofHelmet.label: Ratkin military helmet
LanguageData.RK_BulletProofHelmet.description: A simple metal helmet with goggles worn by Ratkin infantry. Reduces the wearer's fear and improves their aim.
LanguageData.RK_FlatColorCoat.label: Ratkin plain coat
LanguageData.RK_FlatColorCoat.description: An elegant single-colored dress, comfortable to wear and improves social standing.
LanguageData.RK_FrillOnepiece.label: Ratkin frilled one-piece dress
LanguageData.RK_FrillOnepiece.description: A cute one-piece dress with frilled hems, popular with upper-class Ratkin women.
LanguageData.RK_HairCorsage.label: Ratkin hair corsage
LanguageData.RK_HairCorsage.description: A rose-shaped hair corsage, whose elegance empowers every word spoken by its wearer.
LanguageData.RK_RibbonHairBand.label: Ratkin ribbon hair band
LanguageData.RK_RibbonHairBand.description: A small, pretty ribbon worn in one's hair. Its cuteness will make you want to give its wearer more candy - and better trade deals.
LanguageData.RK_SistersDerss.label: Ratkin sister's habit
LanguageData.RK_SistersDerss.description: A demure habit worn by Ratkin sisters, with a side opening for ease of movement. Ideal for administering religious rites and caring for the sick.
LanguageData.RK_SistersVeil.label: Ratkin veil
LanguageData.RK_SistersVeil.description: A demure veil worn by Ratkin sisters. Keeps hair from falling over one's face.
LanguageData.RK_EarCostume.label: Ratkin ear costume
LanguageData.RK_EarCostume.description: A pair of fake ears worn as a costume to mimic cute Ratkins, but will appear off-putting if worn by (larger) humanoids.
LanguageData.RK_Sack.label: Ratkin sack
LanguageData.RK_Sack.description: A simple cloth sack that can hold a lot of items. Popular with Ratkin thieves.
LanguageData.RK_BattleSuit.label: Ratkin battlesuit
LanguageData.RK_BattleSuit.description: A heavily-padded and reinforced battlesuit worn by Ratkin commandos, suitable for combat in extreme climates.
LanguageData.RK_BattleSuitB.label: Ratkin battlesuit
LanguageData.RK_BattleSuitB.description: A heavily-padded and reinforced battlesuit worn by Ratkin commandos, suitable for combat in extreme climates.
LanguageData.RK_Mask.label: Ratkin masked helmet
LanguageData.RK_Mask.description: A helmet with a gas mask worn by Ratkin commandos, allowing the wearer to survive for long periods of time in toxic environments.
LanguageData.RK_MaskB.label: Ratkin masked helmet
LanguageData.RK_MaskB.description: A helmet with a gas mask worn by Ratkin commandos, allowing the wearer to survive for long periods of time in toxic environments.
LanguageData.RK_HeadBand.label: Ratkin headband
LanguageData.RK_HeadBand.description: A simple red headband. Beware of Ratkins wearing these - for they are fearless, fanatical suicide troops.
LanguageData.RK_Plate.label: Ratkin plate armor
LanguageData.RK_Plate.description: A set of medieval plate armor sized for Ratkins. Overlapping solid metal plates offers increased protection for its wearer.
LanguageData.RK_PlateHelmA.label: Ratkin plate helmet A
LanguageData.RK_PlateHelmA.description: A medieval plate helmet. This variant has a pivoting grilled visor, offering visibility without compromising protection.
LanguageData.RK_PlateHelmB.label: Ratkin plate helmet B
LanguageData.RK_PlateHelmB.description: A medieval plate helmet. This variant has a pivoting grilled visor, offering visibility without compromising protection.
LanguageData.RK_PlateHelmC.label: Ratkin plate helmet C
LanguageData.RK_PlateHelmC.description: A medieval plate helmet. This variant is a one-piece barrelled design, with a teutonic cross-shaped opening for vision and ventiation.
LanguageData.RK_WoodenShield.label: Ratkin wooden shield
LanguageData.RK_WoodenShield.description: A round wooden shield designed to defend against attacks from the front. Its deflection chance is based on its material and the bearer's melee skill.
LanguageData.RK_HeavyShield.label: Ratkin heavy shield
LanguageData.RK_HeavyShield.description: A heavy metal shield designed to defend against attacks from the front. Its deflection chance is based on its material and the bearer's melee skill.
LanguageData.RK_SantaRobe.label: Ratkin Santa robe
LanguageData.RK_SantaRobe.description: A festive winter robe worn by Ratkin Santa Claus.
LanguageData.RK_SantaHat.label: Ratkin Santa hat
LanguageData.RK_SantaHat.description: A fur-lined festive winter hat worn by Ratkin Santa Claus.
LanguageData.RK_SantaSack.label: Ratkin Santa sack
LanguageData.RK_SantaSack.description: A big cloth sack, filled with lots of presents.
LanguageData.RK_WhiteCoat.label: Ratkin white coat
LanguageData.RK_WhiteCoat.description: A pure white and fur-lined coat expertly tailored from the finest fabric, worn by upper-class Ratkins.
LanguageData.RK_RoyalRobe.label: Ratkin royal robe
LanguageData.RK_RoyalRobe.description: A long flowing robe embroidered with complex decorative designs. Wildly impractical, its main purpose is to mark the wearer as a member of nobility or royalty.
LanguageData.RK_RoyalCrown.label: Ratkin royal crown
LanguageData.RK_RoyalCrown.description: A grand crown of metal with an elaborate design. Worn by upper-ranking Ratkin nobles and royalty as a symbol of authority.
